cards.front: What are the essential elements of a valid contract?
cards.back: A valid contract requires an offer, acceptance, consideration, legal intention.
Scrum is an iterative framework for managing complex work, with roles like Product Owner, Scrum Master, and Development Team.
A user story is an informal, natural language description of one or more features from an end-user perspective, typically structured as "As a [role], I want [goal], so that [benefit]."
